Detailed Description

Interface class to the (LAL) Hodoscope data.

From the user point of view the class returns maps containing the hits in x and y respectively, but also other values like the timecounter and eventcounter are returned. The latter is useful to check whether the hodoscope has been in synch with the daq.

Author:
R. Poeschl LAL (based on the other interface classes)
Date:
Aug 2007
